graph.packing

Class GRASPPacker1SingleMoveMaker

  • java.lang.Object
    • graph.packing.GRASPPacker1SingleMoveMaker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, AllChromosomeMakerClonableIntf, AllChromosomeMakerIntf

    public class GRASPPacker1SingleMoveMaker
extends java.lang.Object
implements AllChromosomeMakerClonableIntf
    class is an implementation of the AllChromosomeMakerClonableIntf interface for use with the Maximum Weighted Independent Set (MWIS) problem solver DBBGASPPacker. It implements a simple approach to local- search: it removes the top-n nodes (those having maximum connectivity to other nodes) from the current solution, and then calls the GRASPPacker1.pack() method to produce a new solution that it returns as the single "move" to make. In case the packing produced a better solution, the R2XP local search strategy is also kicked off to see if it can further improve on the solution.

    Title: popt4jlib

    Description: A Parallel Meta-Heuristic Optimization Library in Java

    Company:

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ioannis T. Christou

    • Method Detail

      • createAllChromosomes

        public java.util.Vector createAllChromosomes(java.lang.Object chromosome,
                                             java.util.HashMap params)
                                      throws OptimizerException
        main method for the class, removes the specified number of top-nodes from the solution provided in the 1st argument, and then calls the GRASPPacker1.pack() method to create the new solution. If the result is success (improves upon the initial solution), then the R2PX local search kicks in to try to further improve the already improved solution.
        Specified by:
        createAllChromosomes in interface AllChromosomeMakerIntf
        Parameters:
        chromosome - Object // Set<Integer>
        params - HashMap // Map<String key, Object val>
        Returns:
        Vector // Vector<Set<Integer>> with a single solution
        Throws:
        OptimizerException
